meaningMnemonic: You take your <radical>scooter</radical> to <radical>Korea</radical> and everything is <kanji>different</kanji>!
readingMnemonic: What's also <kanji>different</kanji> is that there's a weird tiger bouncing on its tail alongside you yelling that its name is <reading>Tigger</reading> (ちが). You didn't know Tigger was living in Korea these days. That's definitely different.
